articles.title: Sensex ends flat after volatile trade, holds 52k; IT stks dip, metals shine - Business Standard
articles.description: The broader markets ended higher today with the S&P BSE MidCap and SmallCap indices settling 0.2 per cent and 0.43 per cent up, respectively

articles.title: Amazon to make in India, to start production in Chennai by 2021-end - Moneycontrol
